Hm, I'm assuming you want to determine whether installing the game through the store vs steam has an effect on crashing, correct? If so, you need to pair your poll results in order to draw any conclusions about the relationship between crashing and installation method. Might I suggest changing the poll to this instead?

  1. I installed KSP via the KSP Store and my game crashes frequently
  2. I installed KSP via the KSP Store and my game does not crash frequently
  3. I installed KSP via Steam and my game crashes frequently
  4. I installed KSP via Steam and my game does not crash frequently

Sorry, this poll is meaningless b/c of subjective use "frequent" or "few"

an objective statistic would something like "number of crashes per hour of gameplay." 

for me that number is around 3

I installed via Steam and then copied the files to another directory and run from that directory. Half the time, Steam is running in the background and half the time it's not, but it never knows that I'm running KSP.

So I answered "Steam" but begrudgingly.

Do you have a Cat?

-Frequent Crashes

I need DATA!

I only have crashes when there's a particularly explosive staging/ascent/reentry, spend too long in the VAB, leave it be for a few minutes w/o doing anything, or build a rocket that's too big.

Most of my problems comes from bad lag.

Otherwise, it runs just fine, but it is stressful doing big manned stuff, because I don't know if it's going to just lag, or crash at an important moment, so quicksave is my very best friend.

 

But I hope that those who get more frequent crashes gets it fixed soon, in all cases, fly carefully!
